PresentationColumn.name: Order Number
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Number from the Revenue Facts table

PresentationColumn.name: Order Status
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Status value from the Revenue Facts table. Naturally drills into Orders Number Column.

PresentationColumn.name: Order Type
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Type value from the Revenue Facts table. Naturally drills into Orders Status Column.

PresentationColumn.name: Order Size Bin
PresentationColumn.Description: This is a logical calculation object that buckets the order by their size (revenue per order). The calculation is done on the fly by OBIEE server and results in 5 buckets.

PresentationColumn.name: Order to Bill Days
PresentationColumn.Description: This is a logical calculation object that computes for ech order, the number of days between order date and bill date.

PresentationColumn.name: Order to Bill Days Bin
PresentationColumn.Description: This is a logical calculation object that buckets each order into a group, based on the number of days between order date and bill date. The calculation is done on the fly by BIEE server.
